reviewText: I'm still watching them.  Can't wait to settle down for the evening and watch them.
Amazing value and an amazing series!! Received it fast and it is exactly as described. Can't wait for Season 8!

Received my order as described. All 7 seasons. And was excited that it came within 6 days of ordering.
Thumbs up. And I thought the price was very very good for having all 7 seasons.
I caught this show on tv several years ago and couldn't wait to get the dvd's
It's a very good movie
Best series I've ever watched. I'm recommending it to everyone.
I love this show.
I just started watching this series, but so far I give it 5 stars.
Love the show, but the picture quality is very bad on these DVDs. Very disappointing.
Awesome series
This is an awesome series.  Can't wait for Season 8.
great show
Love Heartland!!! Love having the DVD that I can watch anytime. Very happy with Amazon's services.
On time, as promised, complete.

GREAT SERIES, ONE OF THE FEW PRIMETIME SHOWS THE WHOLE FAMILY
CAN SIT AND ENJOY TOGETHER.  AMBER MARSHALL IS GIFTED ACTRESS AND
ALL THE CAST MEMBERS FIT THEIR PARTS SO NATURALY.  HOPING THAT
YEAR 8 IS AVAILABLE SOON.
Excellent condition
Great series! Dvds were in great condition. I can't wait for season 8 to come out!

Friends have been trying to get my family to watch this show since its start in the US. I can't believe it took me so long to give in and watch it! We thoroughly enjoy this show and can't wait for Season 8...and then Season 9 (yes, I'm already counting down to that too) to be on DVD!

My wife and I loved seasons 1-7 and were wondering when seasons 8 and 9 will be available for purchase.  We have heard that Heartland is currently in season 10.  We don't have a computer at home where we could watch it on the internet.  Please send a reply at your convenience.  Sincerely, Paul Reynolds
enjoyed the series. only wish you has season 8.
A must have set, cant wait until season 8 is on disk.
Somehow we had missed this entire series, but thanks to amazon, we are really enjoying all seven seasons.  Great DVDs and great series, especially if you are a horse lover and like drama.

Addicted,  our whole family !  can't wait to see the  show.  Think about visiting the area. What a great way to relax. Laughter, tears  it's all good .  Our two sons are 16yrs and 11yrs. Who knew we could all enjoy one show.
this is one of the best tv series I have watched.  I didn't have to worry with cursing and nudity.
very happy :)

One of the BEST series around where the whole family can watch and enjoy without worrying about off content and you could not ask for a better cast,they make the show so real to the point that you feel like you are there instead of watching.
 I discovered the show from Netflix and got hooked and watch the entire 5 seasons in just over a week and needed MORE!! so thanks to Amazon I was able to find up to season 7 so now just got to wait for season 8.
The movies are for my daughter. She just loves the movies.
Exactly what ordered and arrived as expected. Very happy.

Love this series!  It's something the whole family can watch together!  Hoping there is a season 8.
Great price for all 7 seasons!

If you have been looking for a tv show that can be enjoyed by the whole family then look no further! This is a tremendous series with great plotlines and writing, terrific acting, and one can learn more about horses while seeing lovely natural scenery of Canada. Once you start watching you will want to view the next episode as soon as possible. You will feel deeply connected to the actors, and will feel like part of the family.
Awesome-est set ever. We love them and are rewatching.
Seasons 1 2 4 5 6 7 7. 3 missing  bad experience how do i get missing buy it?
Most excellent. Fast delivery and perfect condition. We are enjoying the series.
Would not play well
Rec'd as ordered.  Love this series!
Love it.
Great family entertainment
Can't get enough of this series! I love that I can now watch it any time I want.
Really like these stories,  Why can't we get type TV from USA.

This is the most wonderful show that I have watched in a long time. I have kids that range from 26 to 17 and they all love it. Even my husband likes it and he does not like horses. It is refreshing, I can't wait to be able to watch another episode. I wish they would play this on tv in the United States.
I love this series of HEARTLAND

My husband and I have just begun watching the 2nd season of Heartland and love it, but, for one thing. Why, in the world, is everyone so dysfunctional? I can understand the kids acting stupid, at times, but the adults......except for Jack. In any case, the show is a cut above most.
Purchased on Saturday and received it the next day!!! I love this show so much!!
